content: end of on needle 2 continue in the established cable the round 24 sts pattern according to chart c1 c2 c3 rnds 11-12 i e 2 rnds knit round 13 *k1 k2tog* repeat * - * to the end of work the gusset decreases on needle 1 as the round 16 sts follows round 14 knit round 15 *k2tog* repeat * - * to the end of the round 1 k1 ssk knit until 3 sts remain k2tog round 8 sts k1 size m round 2 knit round 1 on needle 1 k11 k2tog work *k5 repeat rnds 1 and 2 on needle 1 until 23 27 k2tog* repeat * - * once more work the sts 31 sts remain on needle 1 then knit the sts on needle 2 in the same way 48 sts on needle 1 and continue in the established rnds 2-6 i e 5 rnds knit cable pattern according to chart c1 c2 c3 round 7 *k4 k2tog* repeat * - * to the end of on needle 2 until you ve finished chart c1 c2 the round 40 sts c3 row 63 73 83 next repeat chart c1 rnds 8-11 i e 4 rnds knit c2 c3 row 52-63 62-73 72-83 on needle rnds 12-21 work as described for size s rnds 2 once more and finally work chart c1 c2 6-15 c3 row 64-81 74-93 84-105 should you prefer not to work the last coil you can omit size l chart c1 c2 c3 row 75-80 87-92 99-104 round 1 on needle 1 k13 k2tog work *k6 there are now 46 54 62 sts in total k2tog* repeat * - * once more work the sts on needle 2 in the same way 56 sts knit all sts on needle 1 and needle 2 until foot rnds 2-7 i e 6 rnds knit measures approximately 4 6 8 cm / 1⅝ 2⅜ round 8 *k5 k2tog* repeat * - * to the end of 3⅛ inches less than the desired final length the round 48 sts rnds 9-13 i e 5 rnds knit round 14 *k4 k2tog* repeat * - * to the end of the round 40 sts rnds 15-18 i e 4 rnds knit rnds 19-28 work as described for size s rnds 6-15 finally for all sizes cut the yarn and pull through the remaining 8 sts twice lady-in-waiting socks page 3/9 finishing chart key soak the socks in lukewarm water remove excess water by rolling the socks in a towel let dry flat or on sock blockers weave in ends abbreviations bor - beginning of round cn - cable needle ctl - cable turn left ctr - cable turn right k - knit ktbl/ktbl ctl - sl1 onto cn and hold in front ktbl then ktbl from the cn ktbl/ktbl ctr - sl1 onto cn and hold to back ktbl then ktbl from the cn ktbl/p ctl - sl1 onto cn and hold in front p1 then ktbl from
